languages.text: "Постарайтесь не растерять небесно-голубой покров надежды, Лорд-капитан. Ибо рядом с вами светлее становятся и цвета других".

traits.locale_text: "Постарайтесь не растерять небесно-голубой покров надежды, Лорд-капитан. Ибо рядом с вами светлее становятся и цвета других".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."
languages.original_text: "Постарайтесь не растерять небесно-голубой покров надежды, Лорд-капитан. Ибо рядом с вами светлее становятся и цвета других".

traits.locale_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten up when they are close to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten up when they are close to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “尽量不要挥霍那饱含希望的天蓝色，舰长大人。因为当其他人在你身边时，他们的颜色也会变得更加明亮。”
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: “尽量不要挥霍那饱含希望的天蓝色，舰长大人。因为当其他人在你身边时，他们的颜色也会变得更加明亮。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

languages.text: «Intente no desperdiciar el tejido celeste de la esperanza, Lord Capitán. Los colores de los demás se iluminan al estar cerca de usted».
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: «Intente no desperdiciar el tejido celeste de la esperanza, Lord Capitán. Los colores de los demás se iluminan al estar cerca de usted».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、その空色の希望の布を無駄にしないようにしてください。他の人々の色も、あなたの近くにいるとき、明るくなるのですから」
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、その空色の希望の布を無駄にしないようにしてください。他の人々の色も、あなたの近くにいるとき、明るくなるのですから」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Versucht, dieses himmelsblaue Gewebe der Hoffnung nicht zu vergeuden, Lord Captain. Denn auch die Farben anderer werden heller, wenn sie in Eurer Nähe sind."
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: "Versucht, dieses himmelsblaue Gewebe der Hoffnung nicht zu vergeuden, Lord Captain. Denn auch die Farben anderer werden heller, wenn sie in Eurer Nähe sind."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Accrochez-vous à ce tissu bleu ciel de l'espoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, car lorsque d'autres se tiennent près de vous, leurs couleurs s'illuminent. »
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: « Accrochez-vous à ce tissu bleu ciel de l'espoir, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, car lorsque d'autres se tiennent près de vous, leurs couleurs s'illuminent. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Elindeki gök mavisi umut kumaşını yok yere tüketme Lord Kaptan. Zira sana yakın olunca herkesin rengine canlılık geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Try not to squander that sky-blue fabric of hope, Lord Captain. For others' colours, too, lighten when they are close to you."

traits.locale_text: "Elindeki gök mavisi umudu boşa harcama sakın Lord Kaptan. Sana yakın olunca herkesin rengine canlılık geliyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
